title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7310.12 - Education and training
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7310.12 - Education and training

State Regulations
(a) Each
facility shall provide a formal orientation and training program for new health
care staff which shall include an orientation to the facility's written
policies and procedures for health services. (b) A facility shall require that all newly
appointed facility staff obtain and maintain certification in cardio-pulmonary
resuscitation, provided or approved by a recognized health care training
authority. (c) Each facility shall
maintain written records of the education and training as required by this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7310.12

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
